specs.Data cards: Requires at least 8 GB microSD™ card (supports up to 512 GB), Class 10 or faster (not included)
specs.GPS speed and location info in video: No (yes, if synced with a GPS-enabled dash cam; sold separately)
specs.Parking Guard (alerts you to vehicle imp: No (yes, if using a Constant Power Cable, sold separately; Vault subscription required)
specs.Live View (Wi-Fi connection required): Yes (Garmin Drive app, Vault subscription required)
